arts.sum: Rob Edwards suffered a dismal return to Vicarage Road as Watford shocked high-flying Middlesbrough with a clinical 3-0 victory in the Championship.

arts.ttl: Watford vs Middlesbrough: Boro to take maximum points in Hertfordshire
arts.sum: Watford have been decent at home this season but are lacking consistency and Ryan Murray is siding with Middlesbrough to prevail in this Championship tussle at Vicarage Road.

arts.ttl: All 12 Championship weekend games predictions - Week 13
arts.sum:
Frank Lampard's Coventry kick off the weekend schedule knowing victory at Wrexham on Friday sends them six points clear at the top of the Championship â€” for 24 hours at least.
